parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Defective Wheel Bearing Causing ABS Malfunction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty wheel bearing can disrupt the Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) sensors, leading to sudden and unpredictable brake seizures, which can cause accidents, loss of control, or even result in fatalities.
symptoms: The brakes lock up or seize while driving
and can occur at random times and speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure of ABS System Due to Defective Components
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause the brakes to malfunction, leading to loss of control, accidents, or even fatalities.
symptoms: The brakes lock up or seize while driving
and can occur at random times and speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission/ignition interlock system can cause the vehicle to roll backwards while in park, leading to accidents or injuries, and may also prevent the vehicle from starting, leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle rolls backwards while in park
the shifter moves freely regardless of brake application
the parking brake must be engaged to hold the vehicle in place
the vehicle starts normally after a period of time (30 minutes to an hour) without any other action.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Wheel Bearing Failure Causing Anti-lock Brake Sensor Malfunction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the wheel bearing can cause the anti-lock brake sensor to malfunction, leading to the brakes locking up while driving, which can result in accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The brakes lock up while driving
the vehicle experiences an extremely dangerous driving scenario.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty engine computer can provide incorrect error codes, leading to misdiagnosis and potentially causing the vehicle to stall or fail to start, which can increase the risk of accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The check engine warning light is illuminated
the vehicle stalls or fails to start
